short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to use Gremlins.js for testing web applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Futterman: A Gremlins.js Chrome Extension

Futterman enhances web application testing with Gremlins.js, enabling efficient and thorough testing of web interfaces. Customize menus, configure actions, and seamlessly interact with testing features right from your browser. Tailored for developers and testers, Futterman supports both desktop and mobile browsers, offering responsive design and dedicated support. Donate to support ongoing development and explore more at Futterman Help.

GitHub Repository:  https://github.com/testudoq-org/gremlins2-chrome-ext
